summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ReWear POS clothing purchase app. Backend APIs fully functional, frontend UI working correctly with minor receipt display timing issue during checkout.

integration_issues.issue: Receipt page doesn't open in new tab immediately after checkout button click
integration_issues.workaround: Receipt can be accessed from history page by expanding purchase and clicking Quittung button

passed_tests: Backend categories endpoint with correct structure
Backend purchase creation with correct total calculation
Frontend main page load with category grid and cart sidebar
Frontend price entry using quick buttons (15 CHF)
Frontend cart display with correct totals
Frontend multiple item addition with total updates
Frontend history page with stats display
Frontend receipt page access via history (Quittung button)
Frontend receipt page display with correct details
